descEng: Go the Transport Canada Drone Management Portal and create an account. You can use a Government of Canada login (GCKey), or your online banking login (sign-in partner).
descFra: Go the Transport Canada Drone Management Portal and create an account. You can use a Government of Canada login (GCKey), or your online banking login (sign-in partner).  (fr)

descEng:
Get this information ready:
  • purchase date (if applicable)
  • make, model, serial number, weight and type of drone
  • Visa, Mastercard, American Express, or Interac card
descFra:
Get this information ready:
  • purchase date (if applicable)
  • make, model, serial number, weight and type of drone
  • Visa, Mastercard, American Express, or Interac card
(fr)

descEng: Find something permanent to mark your drone with. We suggest a permanent marker or a label maker.
descFra: Find something permanent to mark your drone with. We suggest a permanent marker or a label maker. (fr)

descEng: Ensure that the label is visible and easy to read.
descFra: Ensure that the label is visible and easy to read. (fr)

descEng: Figure out whether you need to take the Basic or Advanced exam.
descFra: Figure out whether you need to take the Basic or Advanced exam. (fr)

descEng: Learn about your drone's battery, or other fuel system.
descFra: Learn about your drone's battery, or other fuel system.

descEng: Learn about your drone's wifi/signal range
descFra: Learn about your drone's wifi/signal range (fr)

descEng: Learn about your drone's weather limits.
descFra: Learn about your drone's weather limits. (fr)

descEng: Learn how to maintain your drone and controller.
descFra: Learn how to maintain your drone and controller. (fr)

descEng: Learn how to control your drone using a remote control or control software
descFra: Learn how to control your drone using a remote control or control software (fr)
